newsitem.title: UK: Orange says wins millionth customer.
newsitem.headline: Orange says wins millionth customer.

text.p: Orange Plc, Britain's yougest mobile telephone company, said on Wednesday it had won its millionth subscriber amid strong growth.
Orange, launched in 1994, doubled its subscribers in 1996 to 785,000 from 379,000 at the end of 1995. Since the beginning of the year, the company has added another 215,000 subscribers.
"This rapid growth reflects the company's commitment to investing in the Orange brand, providing innovative services and strong customer care," the group said.
The Orange Group, which includes international operations, now has 1.5 million customers.
